recipe.title: Orange Streamer Salad
ingredients: Juice of 1 lemon, or 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar or cider vinegar
instructions: Place the lemon juice or vinegar, honey, soy sauce, and oil in a large mixing bowl. Stir until blended. Grate the carrots into the bowl. Add the raisins and sunflower seeds and mix well. Store in a covered container.
